body_html:
@SsnL @colesbury That's awesome. I actually just realized that I need potrf today. When was it implemented/what version should I use? I'm running on version 0.2.0_3 and it doesn't seem to be implemented yet:

In [15]: a = torch.randn(3, 3); b = Variable(a @ a.t()); torch.potrf(b)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-15-2505760d8c68> in <module>()
----> 1 a = torch.randn(3, 3); b = Variable(a @ a.t()); torch.potrf(b)

TypeError: Type Variable doesn't implement stateless method potrf

body:
@SsnL @colesbury That's awesome. I actually just realized that I need potrf today. When was it implemented/what version should I use? I'm running on version 0.2.0_3 and it doesn't seem to be implemented yet:

```
In [15]: a = torch.randn(3, 3); b = Variable(a @ a.t()); torch.potrf(b)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-15-2505760d8c68> in <module>()
----> 1 a = torch.randn(3, 3); b = Variable(a @ a.t()); torch.potrf(b)

TypeError: Type Variable doesn't implement stateless method potrf
```
